ygData.subject: Re: AE heals
ygData.msgSnippet: You know what thogh we may actually have to go and find some mysterous vendor who sells rare spells....hmmm?? EXAMPLE:Some of the enchanters spells are found
ygData.messageBody:
You know what thogh we may actually have to go and find some
mysterous vendor who sells rare spells....hmmm??>>EXAMPLE:Some of the
enchanters spells are found on a vendor in Ocean of tears

-----Original Message-----
From: Squires, Dean <DeanSquires@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:26 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] AE heals


>From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>
>
>Don't do it Mystik! It' a trap. They only sell smut in that inner
>room, so when you leave, all the NPC's thinks your perverted. ha ha ha
>ha ha
>
>Baelstorm
>
>(Sorry... long work day. I'm tired)
>

>> can
>> find every lvl spell other than lvl 19. Try it Mystik, the higher lvl
>> spells
>> are in inner rooms of the cleric guild in Rivervale.
>>
>> Levo
>> lvl 30
>> Bertox
>> ----- Original Message -----
>> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>

>> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] AE heals
>>
>>
>> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>> >
>> > ok....on lv 34, you get word of health, which is a group
>> heal....heals
>> > around the same as healing, but is ae and uses more mana.....but
>> what
>> > i'm wondering, isn't there an upgrade called word of healing which
>> does
>> > the same thing only with a better heal? i've checked my spell list
>> over
>> > and over, and heard a lv 50 cleric in my guild say something about
>> it,

>> anyone
>> > seen that in the temple of marr there?
>> >
